comments.body: Using the fallback as release script can be used to build any Spark refs (see GIT_REF) where could be no Gemfile at all.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +334,338 @@  cd docs
  # TODO: Make configurable to add this: PRODUCTION=1
  if [ ! -f "Gemfile" ]; then
    cp "$SELF/Gemfile" .
    cp "$SELF/Gemfile.lock" .

comments.body: If we happen to drop Hive 1.2 (or add other combinations of profiles in the distributions), we'll have to change this and [here](https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/29703/files#diff-87e663b6bc59c82beaf09ead1840ac4aR26-R41). I believe this could be done separately later.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +280,284 @@  #   if you're changing them.
  declare -A BINARY_PKGS_ARGS
  BINARY_PKGS_ARGS["hadoop3.2"]="-Phadoop-3.2 $HIVE_PROFILES"
  if ! is_dry_run; then
    BINARY_PKGS_ARGS["without-hadoop"]="-Phadoop-provided"
